title: [大型跑酷地图]Creeper Run —— 苦力怕跑酷|随机事件|超多道具
author: Qwe_Sakura
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Qwe_Sakura 于 2020-3-23 22:12 编辑 
Creeper Run
什么是Creeper Run? Creeper Run是由GCODINGSTUDIOS制作的一张跑酷地图版本为1.15.2这是他的图的介绍CREEPER RUN
CREATED BY GCODINGSTUDIOS
MAP DOWNLOAD
Download
MAP INFO
Creeper Run is a minigame where you have to outrun Creepers while doing parkour.
You get powerups which can help you, or hinder your opponents in multiplayer.
Featuring many different options for difficulty, your games can always have a little spice.
Do you have what it takes to get to the end and save the villagers, or will you succumb to the creepers' explosions?
苦力怕跑酷是一个小游戏,你必须要在跑酷的时候超过苦力怕你会得到能力提升,这样可以帮助你或者你的对手更容易的过关游戏里面提供了很多种难度选择，你的游戏有一些道具你是否有能力去拯救村民，还是屈服在苦力怕的爆炸之下？
我要怎么下载Creeper Run? One原帖Two百度云盘qc3tThree腾讯微云
Creeper Run的视频https://youtu.be/OOemkp8UUQo

Creeper Run的特点Parkour
Powerups
Easter Eggs
Pretty Buildings and Biomes
Over 1000 blocks long
Difficulty
Random Events ? More Requirements:
Minecraft Java 1.15.2
Some Friends (its more fun trust me!)跑酷道具复活节彩蛋漂亮的建筑物和生物群落超过1000个区块难度大随机事件(这里指的是随机获得道具)?修改游戏难度我的世界JAVA版本1.15.2 你可以和你的朋友一起游玩(这样更有趣)
Creeper Run的鸣谢成员指挥/指令:Brenden_MC建筑:sShiba跑酷构建:icupo3测试人员dennysmith04SurvivalistHugoSilentPoliteElPolloMan03FreezingAshM52_Jimmy(注:此为原帖鸣谢成员,并非国内)
Creeper Run的目前版本的更新日志v1.8:
~ Fixed being able to spawn back at spawn while game is active.
~ Fixed scoring system to not set value back to 0 in the result of spawning back at spawn.
~ Adjusted the end score display system to run instantly instead of on a delay.
~ Optimized various command blocks.
~ Fixed credit display system.
~ Fixed a few grammar mistakes.
~ Fixed other small things
v1.8：修复了在游戏进行中陷阱生成问题。修复了计分系统在生成时生成不将值不设置回0的问题。调整了结束得分显示系统，使其立即运行而不是延迟运行。优化了指令命令方块。固定信用显示系统。修正了一些语法错误。修复了其他东西
